meanings.sent1: The lacertines scales on the lizard were shiny.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lacertines creature scurrying across the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The lacertines lizard wore a tiny hat and sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as quick and alert as lacertines hunting for prey.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast a warm glow on the lacertines skin of the lizard.

meanings.definition: A group of reptiles that includes lizards
meanings.sent1: The lacertines basked in the sun on the rock.
meanings.sent2: I observed the lacertines darting in and out of the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The lacertines gathered for a meeting under the tree.
meanings.sent4: The lacertines in the exhibit displayed a variety of colors.
meanings.sent5: A curious child watched the lacertines with fascination.
